items.text: length on of stump, defended to point off the front foot
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: outside edge wide of the only slip. Full and jut outside off. Looks to slice it square on the off side and is too late getting down on it
items.postText: Leg gully comes in after that
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off stump, poked to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: short and angling in at the chest. Mistimed pull to midwicket
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
items.postText: Simon: "19 extras through 19 overs. I've never seen such indiscipline. Good teams will punish us at the world cup if we keep this up"
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, chopped straight to point
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, sliced on the bounce to point
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full on off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run
Astle to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: thin edge to the keeper! Loose from Mahmudullah. Short of a length ball just outside off. Gets leg side of it and looks to run it through short third. A decent take from Latham. Only marginal turn on that
items.shortText: Astle to Mahmudullah, OUT

items.text: short and wide outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Astle to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: full and down leg side. Won't get bat on that
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, 1 wide

items.text: short and just outside off. Gets on top of the bounce and runs this down to third man
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, reaches out and stabs to third man
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length on off, gets it down to third man off the thick edge
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked down the pitch
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short of third man. Short ball rising up outside off. Looks for the upper cut and gets it to third man's left
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, defended on the back foot
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, tapped to extra
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short outside off, sliced to short third
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length on off, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: bit of a tangle between long-on and long-off, who are converging on a chip that is trickling to the boundary. Long-off slides and gets his right hand to it but is also in contact with the boundary as he does this. Length ball on middle and he stepped out and went through with the shot despite not getting to the pitch
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: short and wide outside off, cut to point's right but can't beat his leap
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: mix-up between the batsmen now but point doesn't pick this up. Sabbir was halfway down the pitch when he was sent back. Length ball this was, defended into the covers
items.postText: John Strachan: "What's the record for most wides bowled in an ODI spell? Colin must be getting close!" --- I believe Malinga once bowled 10 wides against Pakistan in 2009, some of which went to the boundary - so a total of 26 runs in wides from his spell that day!
items.shortText: Astle to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length at off, defended into the off side
items.shortText: Neesham to Sabbir Rahman, no run
